title: Topic 005 Question 027
body: You have an Azure Private Link service named PL1 that uses an Azure load balancer named LB1.
You need to ensure that PL1 can support a higher volume of outbound traffic.
options: Increase the number of frontend IP configurations for LB1.
Increase the number of NAT IP addresses assigned to PL1.
Deploy an Azure Application Gateway v2 instance to the source NAT subnet.
Redeploy LB1 with a different SKU.
